content: grannies square the grannies square is a combination of the traditional granny square with a solid granny square the square can be made as small or as large as desired due to repeating rounds notes size h/5 00 mm hook chain 3 counts as a double_crochet lg cluster = 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet sm cluster = 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet round 3 begins the lg cluster rounds in the solid granny rounds round 4 double_crochet in the chain 1s instead of the chain 1 spaces round 4 is the solid granny round and round 5 is the traditional granny round chain 4 and slip_stitch in first chain to make a loop round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet into loop chain 2 * 3 double_crochet chain 2 repeat from * twice and slip_stitch into top of chain 3 round 2 chain 3 double_crochet into next 2 double_crochet sm cluster in chain 2 space * double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet sm cluster in chain 2 space repeat from * twice and slip_stitch into top of chain 3 round 3 slip_stitch to next double_crochet and chain 3 2 double_crochet in same st chain 1 * skip 3 st lg cluster in chain 1 space chain 1 skip 3 st 3 double_crochet in next st chain 1 repeat from * twice skip 3 st lg cluster in chain 1 space chain 1 slip_stitch into top of chain 3 this is an original design by doug speeckaert feel free to make and sell for profit but remember to give credit to me and link back to my blog https //dcspeeckaert blogspot com/ round 4 chain 3 double_crochet across to chain 2 space sm cluster in chain 2 space * double_crochet across and sm cluster in chain 2 space repeat from * twice double_crochet across to chain 3 and slip_stitch into top of chain 3 round 5 slip_stitch to next double_crochet chain 3 and 2 double_crochet into same st chain 1 skip 3 st 3 double_crochet into next st chain 1 lg cluster in corner chain 1 space chain 1 * skip 3 st 3 double_crochet in next st chain 1 across to next chain 1 corner space and lg cluster in chain 1 space chain 1 repeat from * twice skip 3 st 3 double_crochet in next st chain 1 and slip_stitch into top of chain 3 repeat rounds 4 and 5 until desired size is reached and end with a solid granny round as it can serve as a border round courtesy of lyn vj bennett wilson courtesy of lyn vj bennett wilson this is an original design by doug speeckaert feel free to make and sell for profit but remember to give credit to me and link back to my blog https //dcspeeckaert blogspot com/ courtesy of lyn vj bennett wilson this is an original design by doug speeckaert feel free to make and sell for profit but
